video.title: Los Caballeros Las Prefieren Brutas
video.synopsis: This comedy series follows the relationships of several Latin American couples, shedding light on subjects like the battle of the sexes.

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is a successful girl who seems to have it all figured out, until an upheaval in her love life turns her world upside-down.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The strange tension between Cristina and Alejandro grows as they get to know one another, forging a surprising bond of friendship.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Cristina realizes that Pamela and Eduardo are very happy together and wonders how a twit like Pamela can achieve so much with so little effort.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Cristina has been invited to give a talk at a seminar on young, successful women, but she has no idea what she's going to talk about.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Cristina has been nominated for the "Designer of the Year" award. Alejandro returns to his room to find Martina waiting to seduce him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is dating a guy who pays attention to every detail. But she can't help thinking he might be buying her affection just to get her into bed.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro is scared because the attraction he feels for Cristina is more serious than he thought. Cristina finds a woman's earring in the apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Cristina starts running into Eduardo and Pamela in all her usual spots. And on top of that, La Gordita invites them to her birthday party.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Neither Cristina nor Alejandro can stop thinking about the kiss they exchanged. To get over it, Cris goes out with Ricardo, and Alejandro with Rhada.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Cristina puts her plan in motion to "make Alejandro die for her." He tries to keep up the charade but it's getting harder and harder.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro are done talking. She demands a territorial division of the apartment and lays a dividing line right down the middle.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When the bar puts on a costume party, Cristina gets drunk and ends up kissing Alejandro.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Cristina doesn't remember kissing Alejandro but he does. Cristina goes out with a fun guy, but things don't work out.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: While Guillermo is still away, Gracia takes advantage and invites his parents. Alejandro gets an email from an editor urging him to publish his novel.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Cristina finds out that Alejandro slept with Ester, so she goes out with one of Roberta's friends. Meanwhile, Alejandro runs into an old classmate.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro talk about committment. She tells him he's not capable of committing, but he wants to prove her wrong.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro talk about commitment. She tells him he's not capable of committing, but he wants to prove her wrong.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Armando Villalba are a couple. Alejandro and Laura are still trying to make it work, but they're both mad with jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Cristina wins a postgraduate scholarship and everyone congratulates her as she's about to turn 30. Armando's ex leaves the country with the kids.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Cristina goes on a trip with Gracia and Hannah. When Alejandro finds out, he convinces Ester that they should attend a convention in the same city.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Cristina goes on a trip with Gracia and Hannah. When Alejandro finds out, he convinces Ester that they should attend a convention in the same city.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro are a couple and really want to be together. Meanwhile, Cristina finds out that Hannah told on Alejandro and knew about Ester.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Six months have gone by. Cris realizes she misses Alejo a lot and looks for a way to get close to him, but discovers it's not going to be that easy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Cristina must stoically put up with Alejo's fame as well as his fans right in front of her office, since the Jupiter Group is now across the hallway.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Cris finds out about Alejo's declaration to a magazine that Cris was "like napalm in bed," and she is seething with anger.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Cris meets Adrián Lopera, a famous comedian whose book is edited by the Jupiter Group. Unfortunately, Alejo and Adrián hate each other's guts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Alejo finally invites Cris out for a drink, but Francy, one of his psychofans, interferes by locking him up and subjecting him to sexual harassment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Cris decides to try some casual sex to prove to Alejo that she isn't a prude. Her attempts are less than successful.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: As part of his contract with Ester, Alejo has to go out with Rosaura, making Cris jealous. Alma decides to boost Gracia's self-esteem with a boob job.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Ester both want to rent the upstairs floor. They submit the contract application papers, but Ester cheats and rips up Cris's application.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Jupiter approves the remodeling of Alejo's office. He thinks right person to do it is Cristina, and when he presents the idea to her, she accepts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Cris Oviedo Designs wins a design award in Milan, but the carpentry workshop burns down -- and with it, all the prototypes of the winning furniture.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Cris goes out with a telepathist who believes there's an international conspiracy against him. As it turns out, he's crazy and potentially dangerous.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Cris has a string of bad luck but refuses to believe that the predictions of Estrella, an "astrologer," have anything to do with her misfortunes.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Cristina gets burgled; the thieves clean out not only her apartment, but her office as well. Alejo and Pamela may be able to help catch the criminal.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Alejo's financial situation is critical, and yet nothing inspires him to advance with his second novel. Miguel is addicted to his new 3D television.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that Daniel, her therapist, is using her private life to write a book, Cristina goes on the offensive, helped by Rodrigo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Cristina has become so obsessed with her therapy with Daniel that she doesn't do anything without first consulting her psychologist.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: No matter how hard she tries to control herself, Cris can't avoid kissing Daniel. Alejandro learns Ester's going to make a movie based on his novel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: All Cristina can talk about is how perfect Daniel is. Everyone's dying to meet him, but he isn't the least bit interested in meeting Cris's friends.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Cristina crashes into Nina's motorbike, which is badly parked, because she's talking on her cell phone. Nina belatedly realizes the damage is serious.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Daniel invites Cris for a camping weekend to watch a meteorite shower. Due to a misunderstanding, everyone thinks Daniel's planning to propose to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Little by little, the events at the campsite become clearer. Meanwhile, Gracia has to face her second day at her new job, with Guillo as her boss.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Alma meets Daniel under the worst of circumstances. Ester is so absorbed in her work that she unwittingly goes to work on a Sunday.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Cristina thinks Nina is cheating on Alejandro and decides to intervene. Rodrigo falls in love with a famous Colombian football player.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Alejo and Cris have such bad luck that Nina and Daniel meet and get along very well. Now they want to go out as a foursome.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro wake up together in bed and don't know what to say or how to act. Rodrigo continues his clandestine relationship with Yonier.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Alejandro, acting as lovers, wait for everyone to leave the office so they can be alone. Pamela returns and walks in on them having sex.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Daniel has a nightmare in which he is having sex with Pamela. Nina comes back from her work in the field and finds Alejo strange and evasive.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Nina comes back from her work in the field and finds Alejo strange and evasive.  She begins to suspect what could have happened while she was away.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Cris starts exploring real recovery possibilities for the company. Roberta has found out about the situation and has offered to buy the company.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Cris's finances are in trouble. The best thing would be to sell the apartment and go live in Alma's house with Gracia, as her father suggested.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Living-together problems start appearing. Gracia has to put up with Miguel walking around stark naked, and now she has to wait to use the bathroom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Roberta's new proposal for sharing an office with Cris with electronic background music doesn't work out. Cris can't concentrate and needs privacy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Cris, Alejo, Migue, Gracia and Guillo live together under the same roof in perfect harmony, but Martina shows up to threaten the peaceful coexistence.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Just as Gracia and Miguel start getting along, Guillermo gets an offer from his company to transfer to Mexico -- a trip Gracia always dreamed about.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Alejo's father reappears but is unaware that his son doesn't even want to see him. Hannah still doesn't know who the father of her child is.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Cris goes back to her old apartment but misses being close to Alejo. Roberta designs a bottle for a client, but Cris discovers she plagiarized it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Cristian and Aleja arrive in the office looking for a design of a logo for their "S Club." A competition starts between Cristina and Alejandro.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Alejo and Cris have become very close. When Cris thinks he'll finally declare his love for her, Alejo tells her he has to go to Germany for some time.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Cris and Alejo's wedding is only 15 days away, and they're more in love than ever. But one small detail is holding things up: Alejo is married.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Cris and Alejo are anguished by nightmares that augur a dim future as a couple, so they attend a premarital course to see if their fears dissipate.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40
